menuItems.Name: Potato Skins
menuItems.Description: Small serving of stuffed potato skins.

menuItems.Name: Pea Soup
menuItems.Description: Creamy pea soup topped with melted cheese and sourdough croutons.

menuItems.Name: Fried Asparagus
menuItems.Description: Fresh asparagus lightly battered and quick-fried. Topped with crumbled queso fresco, chopped cilantro.

menuItems.Name: House Salad
menuItems.Description: Freshly diced tomatoes, red onion, shredded carrots, cucumbers, 3-cheese blend.

menuItems.Name: Spaghetti Bolognese
menuItems.Description: Freshly cooked spaghetti with a spicy italian tomato sauce.

menuItems.Name: Pesto Chicken
menuItems.Description: Chicken and rice flavoured with green pesto.

menuItems.Name: Triple Berry Crumble Cake
menuItems.Description: blueberries baked with rich buttercake topped with streusel and finished with vanilla ice cream, strawberry sauce.

menuItems.Name: Melt In The Middle Choc
menuItems.Description: Chocolate Sponge with volcanic chocolate in the center.

menuItems.Name: Strawberry Cheesecake
menuItems.Description: Vanilla cheesecake with fresh strawberries on top.
